game.name: Robo Battle
game.description:
Your favourite little robot has decided to go on a very important mission of his life. During this journey, he has no other option rather than blasting his enemies. Would you like to guide him to taste the victory again in the deadliest battle of his life? If yes, join Robo Battle and be prepared to help him to fight against a horde of dangerous enemies along the way. Apart from the heartless enemies, he will also have various other multiple obstacles to deal with. 
Prepare a strategy so that this brave soul witnesses the victory against other war robots, lasers, saws and more in each level of this brand new action game! Grab your weapon, win battles, and do not forget to upgrade them to become more powerful in the advanced levels! Your spunky little robot has multiple tasks to be performed. He is not alone, but armed with a powerful laser cannon. So, help him to dodge, jump and shoot his enemies throughout the way in this HTML5 shooting game. 
The strategy you follow and your robots performance will decide your victory. There are 18 unique and addictive levels to play through and 54 amazing stars to collect. He will have multiple obstacles like thorny wheels, lasers, spiky floors, and so on to deal with. It is your responsibility to avoid them to keep your robot alive in this HTML5 shooting game! Check out other free action games online on atmegame.com to add extra thrill and fun to your boring life!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Robo Battle at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: A- SHOOT, UP ARROW-JUMP, L -R ARROWS- MOVE L-R
